mapper.select: SELECT journalNo, journalTitle, userName , journalDate FROM journal j, user u WHERE j.FK_journal_user = u.userNo AND userNo = #{no} order BY journalNo DESC;
SELECT exerciseCate, exerciseName, exerciseWeight, exerciseSet, exerciseRep FROM exercise WHERE FK_exercise_journal = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO journal(journalTitle, journalDate, FK_journal_user) VALUES(#{title}, SYSDATE() ,#{no})

INSERT INTO exercise(exerciseCate, exerciseName, exerciseWeight, exerciseSet, exerciseRep, FK_exercise_journal) VALUES (#{exerciseCate},#{exerciseName},#{exerciseWeight}, #{exerciseSet},#{exerciseRep},#{FK_exercise_journal})
